\renewcommand{\thefigure}{S\arabic{figure}} \setcounter{figure}{0}
\renewcommand{\thetable}{S\arabic{table}} \setcounter{table}{0}


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
## load libraries
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
library(papaja)
theme_set(theme_apa())

# set global chunk options, put figures into folder
options(tinytex.verbose = TRUE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  include = TRUE,
  warning = FALSE,
  replace.assign=TRUE,
  width = 1800, 
  message = FALSE,
  fig.align='center'
)

set.seed(2022)
```

```{r tab-kappa}
readRDS(file.path("supplementary", "kappa_df.rds")) %>% 
  select(-conf_mat) %>% 
  apa_table(caption="Intra-rater consistency (Cohen's Kappa) for the ANOVAs indentified in the first 20 articles in each journal.",
            longtable = TRUE,
            note="Some extra notes. For cases only one option is reported where Cohen's Kappa cannot be calculated, we manually set the value to 1. Unweighted methods were applied to nominal ratings; weighted methods were applied to ordinal or numeric ratings.")
```
